name: Deathly Survival
description:
The main goal of the game is to start with an ax in his hands to beat out a place in the sun. You will need to collect a variety of resources. For example, firewood can be extracted from trees or bundles of firewood, rocks and ore can be extracted from large boulders. Then you can try to create yourself more advanced tools, for example, from wood and stone you will have a pick, which will allow you to collect materials much faster.

You will need food. You can hunt for a variety of animals represented in the game. Bears, wolves can pose a great danger to novice players. A boar, chicken, rabbit and deer will just run away from you. After you kill the animal from his corpse, you can collect resources such as meat and skin. Next, you can make a fire from the firewood and cook the meat on fire. In the end, you get good food and a better chance of survival.
